title: Simple Things
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Bakery, European
description: Vegetarian restaurant serving European cuisine and smoothies. Has an extensive menu with continental cuisine like vegan garlic cream pasta, tempeh scramble, dairy-free fruit smoothies, and raw mango cheesecake. Also serves Aeropress coffee. Has made-in-house coconut milk and seeded bread. Menu clearly marks vegan choices although honey is included in a dish that can be made vegan. The owners are Georgian.
